name: Joe Disco
description:
Joe Disco

New York, 1976. The year is lookin' good. You're feeling the vibes and you want to boogie it out at the nightclub. No doubt, there's only one place to go: Boogie Wonderland. When you arrive, the party seems to have passed its zenith, but you're here to keep the party alive.
Because YOU. ARE. DISCO. JOE!

How to play

Press the correct keys which are moving on the lower screen when they reach the black bar. If you are doing a good job, the HYPE meter will grow and the party will be ON FIRE. But if not... well, you better don't find out.

Team
- Emil (limered) - Special Effects, Programming
- Michi (ryupold) - Programming, Animations
- Daniel (dfva) - Cool music
- Helen - Design, Animations
- Sven (justsWn) - Sound (all self made)

*We hope you enjoy dancing as Joe!*
*Greetings from Germany* :smiley:
